article_title: OracleVoice: How North Shore-LIJ Is Acing Its Talent Search

article_metadata.author: Oracle

og.description: Few industries are undergoing as much fundamental change as healthcare. Those changes pushed North Shore LIJ healthcare system to ratchet up staff recruitment with new programs and technologies.
